medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient developed sudden onset epigastric pain with nausea and vomiting last night. Today she continued to report epigastric and left-sided abdominal pain, denying fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, or diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Gout, Diverticulitis, CKD stage III, history of Myocardial Infarction, Peripheral edema.
